items.preText: Discussion between the two umpires. They're taking to Rohit and Jadhav. They're looking at Jadhav's bandaged right hand. And he's taking the bandage off now. Wonder if Bangladesh wanted that or the umpires.
items.text: good length on middle, and pulled off the back foot. Hit along the ground to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: full and wide outside off stump. Just over the tramlines, but with the batsman offering no shot, the umpire says it's a wide
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

items.text: good length on middle stump, and punched off the back foot to mid on
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: full just outside off stump, and pushed off the front foot to mid off. The runs are drying up quick and fast
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, but he comes forward to convert it into a full toss. Tapped past the bowler's left to long off
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: good length on off, and straightening after pitching. Defended off the back foot
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and he takes a step forward to caress a straight drive to long on. Keeps strike
items.postText:
Aditya : "After Dhoni retires, he can definitely get into the elite umpires penel. Such an astute observer. No need for DRS when Dhoni is umpriring. "

Veeru: "I think Rohit should bring Bumrah here, it is very hard for a new batsman to adjust to his angle and pace. India should go for the kill."
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, and spinning across his body. Tapped off the front foot to mid on
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, and spinning away once again. Defended with soft hands towards the off side
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: flighted full on middle and leg. Comfortably clipped off his toes to Rohit at mid on as they scamper across for a run
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, and that's been swept hard. But straight to Jadhav manning the backward-square boundary
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.preText: PrinceofVellore: "For someone not seeing the game, can you explain what the issue with Jadhav's bandage was?" -- speculation from my end, but it's probably because the colour of the bandage was close to that of the ball. Hard to pick the delivery off the hand
items.text: full on middle and leg, and once again smothered down the ground to long on for one
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: full outside off stump. Enough width to free his arms, and he slaps a drive to Rohit at cover. Time for another drinks break
items.postText:
Darshan Mandali: "@veeru : I know you are veeru paji.. always wanted to go for kill, be it bowling or batting.

Luvish: "Veeru: I beg to differ. Spinners have been constantly getting wickets and also controlling the run-rate. I think they should continue to bowl till they are 7 down."

Manish Mittal: "@Aditya I somehow get the feeling that Dhoni will not be connected with cricket a lot after his retirement...even now between his off-cricket period, he appears to be intensely private"
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, no run

items.preText: Rohit: "You remember when Curtly Ambrose was asked to take his band off? pure destruction" -- Ah, Dean Jones regretted that decision!
items.text: full on middle stump. Just 76 kph, and he defends this towards the leg side
items.postText: James: "Liton Das 107 off 99. Rest 48 off 109. One man show."
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend. Tapped back to the bowler
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, and worked off his toes to square leg. The batsman has gone halfway down the wicket, and he's been told to go back. Soumya does well to turn around quickly and scamper back. Dhoni didn't even grab the ball, by the way. His gloves broke the stumps while trying to flick the ball onto the wickets
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and he bends his knee to cut this square off the back foot. Straight to point
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: good length just outside off, and he dabs it off the back foot. Racing past Chahal at short third man, but he manages to pull it back
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, 2 runs

items.text: full just outside off, and he pushes this off the front foot to cover point. Enough time to take the single
items.postText: Sahaj: "Looks like commentators have too much time between overs and posting 3-4 comments. I say bring on Jaddu " -- my fingers are already trembling at that thought
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: full on off, and angling away. Firmly driven off the front foot to mid off, but straight to Karthik near the circle
items.shortText: Bumrah to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and he tries to cut this late. Misses as the ball goes over his blade and into MSD's gloves. Could've easily tickled that to the keeper
items.shortText: Bumrah to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, and he gets onto the back foot to block
items.shortText: Bumrah to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he's nowhere near the pitch of the ball. Tries to drive through the covers, but the ball moves away after pitching, and also sneaks past the bat's outside edge
items.shortText: Bumrah to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: back of a length just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to the off side. They want the single, but eventually choose not to after seeing that the ball has gone to Ravindra Jadeja
items.shortText: Bumrah to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: full on middle, and flicked off his pads to deep backward square. Nicely timed off the bat, and Rayudu's diving effort in the deep ensures it's just two
items.postText: Velu: "Last 5 Overs Das has played only 7 balls.."
items.shortText: Bumrah to Soumya Sarkar, 2 runs
